AI/AI Assist Bot.title: AI Assist Bot
AI/AI Assist Bot.description: This configuration needs to be passed to AI Smart Replies Class when it is passed to `setAiFeatures()` method of `UIKitSettingsBuilder`.

AI/AI Conversation Starter.title: AI Conversation Starter
AI/AI Conversation Starter.description: Configure Conversation Starter with this class.

AI/AI Conversation Summary.title: AI Conversation Summary
AI/AI Conversation Summary.description: AI Conversation Summary is a class which generates a summary of a given conversation.

AI/AI Smart Replies.title: AI Smart Replies
AI/AI Smart Replies.description: This configuration needs to be passed to AI Smart Replies Class when it is passed to `setAiFeatures()` method of `UIKitSettingsBuilder`.

AI/Integration.title: Integration
AI/Integration.description: By default, SmartReplies and ConversationStarter will be enabled if they are enabled from the dashboard as well.

Calls/Call Buttons.title: Call Buttons
Calls/Call Buttons.description: This component provides users with the ability to make calls, access call-related functionalities, and control call settings. Clicking this button typically triggers the call to be placed to the desired recipient.

Calls/Incoming Call.title: Incoming Call
Calls/Incoming Call.description: The incoming call component is displayed when the user receives an incoming call, such as a voice call, video call. It serves as a visual representation of an incoming call and provides options for the user to answer or decline the call.

Calls/Ongoing Call.title: Ongoing Call
Calls/Ongoing Call.description: This component is displayed during an ongoing voice or video call. This provides a dedicated screen or interface where users can engage in real-time conversation, view video streams, access call controls, and interact with various call-related features.

Conversations/Contacts.title: Contacts
Conversations/Contacts.description: CometChatContacts is a standalone UI component specifically designed to facilitate the display and management of users and groups within chat applications. It streamlines the process of showcasing all app users and available chat groups in a user-friendly interface, making it easier for users to connect and communicate effectively.

Conversations/Conversations.title: Conversations
Conversations/Conversations.description: This component lists the most recent or latest conversations or contacts with whom you have exchanged messages. It provides a convenient way to quickly access and resume conversations with the people you have been in contact with recently.

Conversations/Conversations with Message.title: Conversations With Messages
Conversations/Conversations with Message.description: This component is responsible for displaying the recent conversation between participants in a 1:1 or group chat. It also allows users to send text, images, videos, or other media as messages to communicate with one another in real-time.

Elements.title: Elements
Elements.description: Elements is a set of pre-built UI components that act as building blocks of our UI Kit. These UI components are built following the web components standard and using lit library. This allows us to create a framework-agnostic solution so that they can be integrated with our web UIKits such as React, Angular and Vue.

Groups/Add Members.title: Add Members
Groups/Add Members.description: This component allows administrators or group owners to add new members to a specific group. It enables administrators or group owners to extend the membership of a group by adding new users to participate in the group's discussions and activities. By utilising this feature, administrators can manage group membership, and control access to group content.

Groups/Banned Members.title: Banned Members
Groups/Banned Members.description: This component lists all the users who have been restricted or prohibited from participating in specific groups or conversations. When the user is banned, they are no longer able to access or engage with the content and discussions within the banned group.

Groups/Group Details.title: Group Details
Groups/Group Details.description: CometChatDetails is a component that provides additional information and settings related to a specific group.

Groups/Group Members.title: Group Members
Groups/Group Members.description: This component lists all the users who have been added or invited to participate in a particular group and have access to its discussions, shared content, and collaboration features.

Groups/Groups.title: Groups
Groups/Groups.description: This component lists all the groups created on CometChat and also allows users to search for groups. It enables users to find and locate specific groups based on various search criteria or parameters.

Groups/Groups with Messages.title: Groups with Messages
Groups/Groups with Messages.description: This component is responsible for listing all the groups created on CometChat. It also allows group members to send text, images, videos, or other media as messages to communicate with one another in real-time.

Groups/Transfer Ownership.title: Transfer Ownership
Groups/Transfer Ownership.description: This component allows the current owner or administrator of a group to transfer the ownership rights and administrative control of that group to another user. By transferring ownership, the original owner can designate a new user as the group owner, giving them full control and administrative privileges over the group.

integration/CometChatUIKit.title: CometChat UI Kit
integration/CometChatUIKit.description: CometChatUIKit is a class that contains all necessary methods to help initialise the CometChat SDK with valid credentials for the UI Kit to utilise.

integration/Theme.title: Theme
integration/Theme.description: Theme class provides endless number of customisations to improve or transform the look and feel of the UI Kit as per your application need. Learn more.

Messages/Message Composer.title: Message Composer
Messages/Message Composer.description: This component allows users to compose and send messages. It provides a text input area or field where users can enter their messages or responses before sending them to other participants in the conversation.

Messages/Message Header.title: Message Header
Messages/Message Header.description: This component contains relevant information relevant to the chat conversation.

Messages/Message Information.title: Message Information
Messages/Message Information.description: CometChatMessageInformation is a standalone component that displays comprehensive information about the message receipts. This will enable users to easily access details such as the message content, recipient and delivery receipt information for a more informed communication experience.

Messages/Message List.title: Message List
Messages/Message List.description: This is a fundamental component of the chat interface that displays a list of chat messages exchanged between participants in a conversation. It serves as a chronological log of the conversation, presenting messages in the order they were sent.

Messages/Messages.title: Messages
Messages/Messages.description: This component is responsible for displaying the conversation between participants in a 1:1 or group chat.

Messages/Threaded Messages.title: Threaded Messages
Messages/Threaded Messages.description: This component allows users to organise and group related messages into separate conversations within a larger conversation. It provides a way to maintain context, focus, and clarity when multiple discussions or topics are happening simultaneously within a chat.

nuxt.js integration/index.title: Nuxt.js Integration
nuxt.js integration/index.description: Using Vue UI Kit, you can integrate your Nuxt.js application with CometChat.

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: CometChat's UI Kit for Vue, you can easily built an chat app with all the essential messaging feature along with the customisations and so on as per your application needs. This UI Kit is a set of prebuilt UI components divided into smaller modules and components and each and every component is configurable to suit your need.

Shared.title: Shared
Shared.description: This module contains reusable components, utilities, constants, and helper functions that are used across the other CometChat's web UI Kits. Learn more

ui-components/index.title: UI Components
ui-components/index.description: CometChat's UI Kit is a set of pre-built UI components that allows you to easily craft an in-app chat with all the essential messaging features.

Users/User.title: Users
Users/User.description: This component lists all the users registered on CometChat and also allows users to search for other users. It enables users to find and locate specific individuals based on various search criteria or parameters. Online users are represented with a green colored dot.

Users/User Details.title: User Details
Users/User Details.description: CometChatDetails is a component that provides additional information and settings related to a specific user.

Users/Users with Messages.title: Users with Messages
Users/Users with Messages.description: This component is responsible for listing all the users registered on CometChat. It also allows users to send text, images, videos, or other media as messages to communicate with one another in real-time.

Views/Message bubble.title: Message Bubble
Views/Message bubble.description: This component is used to visually represent individual messages and display them in a conversation-like format.

Views/Tabs.title: Tabs
Views/Tabs.description: This component allows for the organisation and presentation of content or functionality into separate tabs or sections. It provides a way for users to switch between different tabs to access distinct sets of information or perform specific actions.

Views/User Member Wrapper.title: User Member Wrapper
Views/User Member Wrapper.description: The CometChatUserMemberWrapper is a UI component that combines the features of CometChatUsers and CometChatGroupMemberWrapper. It's designed to work behind the scenes in the CometChatMessageComposer to show a simple and smart list of suggestions when users want to mention others in their messages. This makes it easier for users to engage with each other and manage group conversations in a smooth and convenient way.
